name: Lookout
flavour_text: A glorious vista once exclusive to emperors. Not anymore.

name: Beach
flavour_text: A paradise, forever replenished by endless waves teeming with life.

name: Graveyard
flavour_text:
Unknown legacies.
Untold stories.

name: Dungeon
flavour_text: A penitentiary for those who are not penitent is nothing more than an inn for the evil.

name: Alleyways
flavour_text: An unwashed gutter, where wretches cut purses and throats alike.

name: Pen
flavour_text: Slaves held like cattle. A blood-soaked revolution, just waiting to happen.

name: Desert
flavour_text: Heat. Dust. Wind. These are what forge strong minds and bodies.

name: Arid Lake
flavour_text: Water vanishes; an impromptu prison becomes a tomb.

name: Flooded Mine
flavour_text: In darkness, beast and man alike clamour to survive.

name: Marshes
flavour_text: Embraced by mud. Grasped by roots. The careless are silently swallowed.

name: Iceberg
flavour_text: Icy fangs seek tender hulls to sink themselves into.

name: Cage
flavour_text: Treat a man like a wild animal, and he will soon learn to bite.

name: Springs
flavour_text: Clear water springs forth. A moment of purity before it too gathers filth.

name: Excavation
flavour_text: Two unexplored frontiers remain: The skies and the soil.

name: Leyline
flavour_text: Amidst the barren wastes, a slender strand of life blooms.

name: Peninsula
flavour_text:
The farmer no longer plows
or sows. Only the flattened
soil remains.

name: Port
flavour_text: The wealthy foolishly battle the ocean for domain.

name: Burial Chambers
flavour_text: Vile fiends hide beneath the peaceful plains.

name: Cells
flavour_text: Life crushed together. Left to crumble to dust.

name: Arcade
flavour_text: We create so that some part of us may remain after death.

name: City Square
flavour_text: Countless generations have walked these time-worn stones.

name: Relic Chambers
flavour_text: Relics of a forbidden past. Hidden away. Forgotten.

name: Courthouse
flavour_text: Justice born of love is a surrender. Justice born of law is a punishment.

name: Strand
flavour_text:
Nothing good washes up
on this dark shore.

name: Whakawairua Tuahu
flavour_text: We all began life in darkness, we shall all end it there.

name: Chateau
flavour_text: Beauty and brutality in such close proximity.

name: Grotto
flavour_text: Trapped in absolute darkness. Despair. Panic. Terror.

name: Gorge
flavour_text:
We must all walk the narrow,
winding path. The end
is always the same.

name: Volcano
flavour_text:
Tremble in the might
of the flames.

name: Lighthouse
flavour_text:
Fire ignites the sky.
A signal to keep away.
An invitation to invade.

name: Canyon
flavour_text: A deep wound in the land. One that will never heal.

name: Conservatory
flavour_text: Ornate, elaborate, ostentatious... and dripping with death.

name: Sulphur Vents
flavour_text: The creatures that prowl the wildest extremes, nature anoints with cruel efficacy to defend her.

name: Haunted Mansion
flavour_text: Forlorn and sorrowful, this once opulent ruin conceals the sins of a fallen line.

name: Maze
flavour_text: They live trapped forever in darkness and confusion. We are no different.

name: Channel
flavour_text: The stone cannot stop the torrent. It can only divert it.

name: Toxic Sewer
flavour_text: Affluence and effluence, separated by a few feet of soil.

name: Ancient City
flavour_text:
This was not the first
civilization to believe itself
the greatest. And it will
not be the last.

name: Ivory Temple
flavour_text: Man and nature intertwined, but only for the chosen few.

name: Spider Lair
flavour_text: Panic only hastens the venom's passage to the heart.

name: Barrows
flavour_text: Man burrows for only the eternal hibernation.

name: Mausoleum
flavour_text: A vault for the dead, as if they were valuable. Pathetic.

name: Fields
flavour_text: They pleaded for the gods to bless their land. Now they lie under the soil.

name: Jungle Valley
flavour_text: Verdant canopies shroud the world in darkness.

name: Phantasmagoria
flavour_text: Every movement is watched, recorded, remembered.

name: Academy
flavour_text: They came for enlightenment, but were imprisoned by madness.

name: Thicket
flavour_text:
Little light enters.
No life escapes.

name: Wharf
flavour_text: Reach out into the abyss, and the abyss reaches back.

name: Ashen Wood
flavour_text:
Desperately reaching skyward
and digging downwards.
Sustenance is an
eternal struggle.

name: Atoll
flavour_text: Time turns even the vicious volcanoes to hollow shells.

name: Maelström of Chaos
flavour_text:
Whispers from
a world apart
Speak my name
beyond the tomb;
Bound within
the Maelström's heart,
Will they grant me
strength or doom?

name: Cemetery
flavour_text: A stone forest of forgotten names.

name: Hallowed Ground
flavour_text:
Some dead have long
envied the living.
When given the chance,
they take from us what they can.
So we offer our suffrage.
In return, they give
only suffering.

name: Underground Sea
flavour_text: Silent stillness. The waters are as cold as they are black.

name: Tribunal
flavour_text: So much power in the hands of so few.

name: Coral Ruins
flavour_text: Thrust above the waves, still teeming with horrors from the depths.

name: Lava Chamber
flavour_text: Fiend and fortune-hunter alike turned to ash. A sorry alliance of unending agony.

name: Residence
flavour_text: Home only to misery now.

name: Ramparts
flavour_text: A wall is the surest sign for raiders that there is something of value to take.

name: Dunes
flavour_text: Shifting, morphing, expanding. A reminder of the virtues of an agile mind.

name: Pillars of Arun
flavour_text: Man creates where nature cannot.

name: Bone Crypt
flavour_text:
The dead ask to be remembered,
but such requests
are seldom met.

name: Olmec's Sanctum
flavour_text:
They flew, and leapt,
and clambered over,
They crawled, and swam,
and slithered under.
Still its ancient secrets
await unclaimed
And of this hidden temple,
only legends remain.

name: Underground River
flavour_text: Life, like still water, becomes trapped. Stagnant. Foul.

name: Caer Blaidd, Wolfpack's Den
flavour_text:
Howls and laughter
They hide in the day
They smell you, they watch you
They track their new prey

name: Gardens
flavour_text: Vibrant colours dash across the grey, consuming Man's work.

name: Arachnid Nest
flavour_text: Man is not the only beast to bend nature to its will.

name: Bazaar
flavour_text: Greed is the only god here.

name: Laboratory
flavour_text: My last waking moments looked very much like this place... I miss it. I miss her.

name: Infested Valley
flavour_text: Should we feel disgusted at how the weak predate the strong, or should we feel... admiration?

name: Overgrown Ruin
flavour_text: Only fear remains unforgotten, where once magnificent rites drew important crowds.

name: Vaal Pyramid
flavour_text:
A good slave is driven by
only two thoughts:
service and sacrifice.

name: Vaults of Atziri
flavour_text:
"Should I depart this mortal coil,
so shall all of my treasures."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

name: Geode
flavour_text:
Many hands may
move a mountain.

name: Armoury
flavour_text: There is no war. There is no army. Only fear lingers.

name: Courtyard
flavour_text: An elaborate, beautiful garden, hidden from the public. Selfish.

name: The Vinktar Square
flavour_text:
To the east, 
it cannot be seen.
To the west, 
it cannot be touched.
To the south, 
it cannot be remembered.
And to the north, 
it cannot be contained.

name: Mud Geyser
flavour_text: Filth springs forth like blood from a severed jugular.

name: Shore
flavour_text: Each life, each act, as fleeting as footprints in the sand.

name: Mao Kun
flavour_text:
The Treasures of the Tides
wait in agony
at the End of the World.

name: Tropical Island
flavour_text:
The temptations of paradise
draw forth the good
and the bad alike.

name: Mineral Pools
flavour_text:
God's jar of raw materials.
Life lying dormant,
waiting to sprout.

name: Moon Temple
flavour_text: Night's promises are dark, for even the stars must be harvested.

name: The Twilight Temple
flavour_text:
In the shadow of war,
all are eclipsed.

name: Sepulchre
flavour_text: Lives come and go. Only bones and dust remain.

name: Tower
flavour_text: We ascend to great heights to commit low acts.

name: Waste Pool
flavour_text:
Verdant life blossoms
amidst death.

name: Plateau
flavour_text: Steep cliffs divide where the trees may grow, and where they may not.

name: Estuary
flavour_text: Where land springs from water, life will shortly follow.

name: Vault
flavour_text: Wealth beyond imagining, locked beyond reach.

name: Temple
flavour_text: Immaculate white stone rises from the abyss. Perfection.

name: Poorjoy's Asylum
flavour_text:
Laughs of all the twisted
Echo through these
halls of gold.
In this cold forgotten void
They wander, forever uncontrolled.

name: Arena
flavour_text: The sound of a thousand calls for blood echo for eternity.

name: Museum
flavour_text: Ancient artifacts and beautiful baubles. All paid for in blood.

name: The Putrid Cloister
flavour_text:
Please take out your blades,
your whips, and your spikes.
Class is now in session.

name: Scriptorium
flavour_text: Knowledge balanced atop a vast pit. Hold on, or perish in the darkness of ignorance.

name: Siege
flavour_text: No rest, no peace, no negotiation. Only War.

name: Shipyard
flavour_text: The stone and lumber sleeps. The captains are long dead. Only the sea knows their end.

name: Belfry
flavour_text: Bells are rung in celebration, and in sorrow. And, finally, in despair.

name: Arachnid Tomb
flavour_text:
They feel your every move,
your every breath,
with a million little wires.

name: Wasteland
flavour_text: A white bone stripped of its fertile flesh. Life spirals towards its end.

name: Precinct
flavour_text: Crushed together and fenced in, to live out their lives like cattle.

name: Bog
flavour_text: Layer upon layer of death and rot. Disgusting.

name: Pier
flavour_text:
Man's reach extends into
the ocean, clawing at
its infinite depths.

name: Cursed Crypt
flavour_text: Saints and heathens look the same once the rot takes hold.

name: The Coward's Trial
flavour_text:
For his sins
he was hunted in his sleep,
judgement wrought
of twisted nightmare.
The Coward bound
his dreams to stone,
awaiting another to walk
the path of true atonement.

name: Orchard
flavour_text: The fruit that grows from bloody ground tastes sweetest.

name: Promenade
flavour_text:
Even the greatest achievements
will eventually be abandoned.

name: The Hall of Grandmasters
flavour_text:
The grandest and greatest
ever to fight,
Divine the champions stand tall.
But match their power,
best their might,
And even the immortal may fall.

name: Lair
flavour_text: In darkness, the alpha rises. The companionship of beasts is fragile indeed.

name: Colonnade
flavour_text:
Small minds demand
the largest structures.

name: Primordial Pool
flavour_text:
A dough of bad blood.
A yeast of ill will.

name: Spider Forest
flavour_text:
Each branch, each leaf,
an extension of a web
that spans sanity.

name: Coves
flavour_text: The dark seas swallow the careless and spit them against sharp rocks.

name: Waterways
flavour_text: A river in the sky, far from that which so desperately needs it.

name: Factory
flavour_text: Repetition. Convention. Duplication. Creation distilled to perfection.

name: Mesa
flavour_text:
Barren and sun-bleached.
Emptiness as far as
the eye can reach.

name: Pit
flavour_text: Blood turns the soil to mud.

name: Defiled Cathedral
flavour_text: Crafted with reverence. Defiled with ease.

name: Summit
flavour_text: We are swept ever upwards by our ambition, with no thought of what awaits us at the peak.

name: Overgrown Shrine
flavour_text: A once great monument, now a forgotten memorial.

name: Acton's Nightmare
flavour_text:
Curious, she shook it then,
And tiny screams emerged.
Curiouser, she shook again,
And an eerie silence purred.

name: Castle Ruins
flavour_text: When the castle falls, it has failed its only purpose.

name: Crystal Ore
flavour_text: As the torch flickers, brilliance emerges in boundless variance.

name: Villa
flavour_text: Wealth is powerless to stop the corroding force of time.

name: Torture Chamber
flavour_text: Who is the true criminal, the one behind bars, or the one who tortures him?

name: Oba's Cursed Trove
flavour_text:
"Here the soil is more deadly than any swing of the axe."
- Oba of the Karui,
Conqueror of Corruption.

name: Necropolis
flavour_text: Even in death, we long to be close to one another.

name: Death and Taxes
flavour_text:
So the raiders danced,
leading their foe ever west,
towards certain death.

name: Racecourse
flavour_text: Rats chase their tails for the amusement of fools.

name: Caldera
flavour_text: From the heart of fire, rivers of burning rage billow forth.

name: Ghetto
flavour_text:
Amongst the rabble,
brutality is the law.

name: Park
flavour_text: A brief respite in a sea of obligation and uncertainty.

name: Malformation
flavour_text:
Boils swell from the earth.
Foul malignant flesh
without purpose.

name: Terrace
flavour_text: A garden on a stone pedestal. An incredible, and foolish, feat.

name: Shrine
flavour_text: Black tiles don't stain so easily.

name: Arsenal
flavour_text: There is no war. There is no army. Only rage lingers.

name: Desert Spring
flavour_text: As mirage becomes reality, hardship is briefly quenched.

name: Core
flavour_text: Black monstrous bridges cross oily rivers, leading nowhere. Nothing as it should be.

name: Colosseum
flavour_text:
Life means as little as a passing
moment of entertainment.
Let them rot.

name: Acid Lakes
flavour_text:
The water brings life,
the poison takes it away.

name: Dark Forest
flavour_text: The trees grow twisted and gnarled, without a hint of light. A curse lingers here.

name: Crimson Temple
flavour_text: A sanguine supplication to death and depravity.

name: Plaza
flavour_text: Drought took the plants, famine took the people.

name: Dig
flavour_text: A hollow echo of bygone times in a land where none lived for long.

name: Palace
flavour_text:
Death forces even the most
determined of despots to
pass the crown.

name: Lava Lake
flavour_text: At the heart of a peaceful, secluded valley, an island of burning, consuming fury.

name: Basilica
flavour_text: Built so the prayers would echo. A resonance no god could hear.

name: Sunken City
flavour_text: From the walls, water, and ferns... Death comes crawling on ancient steps.

name: Reef
flavour_text: Each plank of rotting wood, each dead sailor, feeds the island and makes it grow.

name: Carcass
flavour_text: Life's wet, reproductive stink abates, relenting to death's chaste ritual of decay.

name: Pit of the Chimera
flavour_text: One of my captors hid a beast within his heart. Now his true self can be seen by all.

name: Lair of the Hydra
flavour_text: One of my captors wore many faces, yet kept her true face hidden. Now she cannot escape her true face.

name: Maze of the Minotaur
flavour_text: One of my captors felt no emotion. He did not hesitate to inflict pain. Now all he feels is intense, unstoppable agony.

name: Forge of the Phoenix
flavour_text: One of my captors refused redemption. He did not see value in a new life. Now new life surrounds him.

name: Vaal Temple
flavour_text: Voices. Visions. Violence. They will haunt these grounds for all of eternity.

name: The Shaper's Realm
flavour_text: The nexus of nothingness and equilibrium of eternity.
